name: Iron Man
storyline: The film follows the story of Tony Stark (played by Robert Downey Jr.), a brilliant and wealthy industrialist who is also an ingenious inventor and weapons manufacturer. While on a trip to Afghanistan to demonstrate a new weapon, Stark is kidnapped by a terrorist group known as the Ten Rings. During his captivity, he is gravely injured and forced to build a powerful weapon, but instead, he constructs a high-tech suit of armor to escape.
